text: Kōraā, ‘tē'ōm̐ tōmālōkara ōparara paraā bā talara paraā śāsti paṭhābalai, nā'ibā tōmālōkaka bibhinna sandēhapūrṇa dalata bibhakta karaibalai athabā ēṭā dalaka āna ēṭā dalara saṅgharṣara sōraāda grahaṇa karaābalai pūrṇa sakṣama’. Cōraā, āmi kēnēkai bibhinna dharaṇē āẏātasamūha bibr̥ta karaō yātē siham̐tē bhālakai bujiba pāraē
